scripts.cy:e2e: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx cypress run --browser chrome
scripts.cy:e2e:spec: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev TZ=UTC npx cypress run --browser chrome --headed --spec
scripts.cy:e2e:feature: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev TZ=UTC npx cypress run --browser chrome --headed --spec
scripts.cy:e2e:tag: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev TZ=UTC npx cypress run --browser chrome --headed --env tags=
scripts.cy:e2e-ui: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev TZ=UTC npx cypress run --browser chrome --headed --spec cypress/e2e/ui/specs/*.cy.js
scripts.cy:e2e-api: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev TZ=UTC npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/api/specs/*.cy.js'
scripts.cy:e2e-ui:regression: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx cypress run --browser chrome --headed --env tags='@ui or @regression'
scripts.cy:e2e-api:regression: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx cypress run --env tags='@api'
